attributes.action: Allow members of the public to be able to appeal to a lawyer in cases that have been disallowed by the Financial Ombudsman Service. I also request that the Quality Service Managers Office come under ministerial supervision and not allowed to be a law unto themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My bank has taken much money from me for a loan I discovered in 2003 was used to achieve this. I never ever had a loan, the bank have no evidence whatever to show that I did, and I told them that before they had to admit they did not, but they use the balance of probabilities to say I did ?? they threatened my family to such a degree before during and after their own investigations and those of the Ombudsman we fled our home to escape. They produced a computer readout for 1987 and presented it to the Ombudsman and Adjudicator who decided this completely false document was genuine and threw my chance of a hearing out, and my chance of getting my money returned to me. This was  and is injustice perpetrated by 2 people who should not be responsible for legal matters because this readout is false, and has been condemned by 2 bankers as worthless, I have since received documents via the ICO that are also false due to being altered to fit their desired argument. Further ICO documents prove it.
